div.bibl: De Forenede Staters Danske Almanak, 1914. [THE SCANDINAVIAN SOCIALISTS]

body.p: 1. "Skandinavisk Socialist Forbund" has the following societies in Chicago:-
1. Section No. 1. Meets twice a month in Wabansia Hall, Jens Fenstad, secretary.
2. Section No. 2. "Karl Marx Klubben," twice a month in Wabansia Hall, R. Lassen, secretary.
3. Section No. 9. twice a month at the office of "Svenska Socialisten, 911 Belmont Ave. Gideon Edberg, secretary.
4. Section No. 35. "Skandinavisk Socialistisk Kvindeforening," meets twice a month at 1924 N. California Ave., Mrs. Emil Bjercke, secretary.
